verse.roman:
gṛhītvā śṛṅgayos taṁ vā
aṣṭādaśa padāni saḥ
pratyapovāha bhagavān
gajaḥ prati-gajaṁ yathā

synonyms: gṛhītvā—seizing; śṛṅgayoḥ—by the horns; tam—him; vai—indeed; padāni—steps; saḥ—He; pratyapovāha—threw back; bhagavān—the Supreme Lord; gajaḥ—an elephant; prati-gajam—a rival elephant; yathā—like.
translation: The Supreme Lord Kṛṣṇa seized Ariṣṭāsura by the horns and threw him back eighteen steps, just as an elephant might do when fighting a rival elephant.
